data.actual_result: The toggle button tries sliding but goes back to its original position.
data.expected_result: The toggle button slides to the opposite side.
data.short_description: Toggle button animation is broken in Notification Settings.
data.steps_to_repro: - In any server open Notification Settings - Try changing any of the "toggle" settings - (Note that the underlying setting does change but you have to close and reopen the modal for the changes to appear)
